name: Super Mario Bros. 3
synopsis: When Bowser and Bowser's Minions cause havoc in the Mushroom World, Mario and Luigi must spring into action once again. The acclaimed Super Mario Bros. 3 features more Mario action than ever before: fly as Raccoon Mario, swim as Frog Mario, throw fireballs as Fire Mario and become an invincible statue as Tanooki Mario. With eight huge worlds to explore, new mini games to enjoy and countless secrets to discover, Super Mario Bros. 3 truly deserves its status as one of the greatest games ever made!
